price: De ki: Allah doğru söylemiştir. Öyleyse, hanif olan İbrahim’in yoluna uyun! O, müşriklerden değildi.
arabic: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
